cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to a negative value -1 will cause thread allocation errors and prevent proper PUSCH processing initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an unknown enum value 'error' will cause logging configuration failure and prevent proper hardware logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將 hw_log_level 設定為未知的枚舉值 'error' 會導致日誌配置失敗，並阻止正確的硬件日誌記錄。
